_comments.all: This configuration file controls the text and labels displayed in the 'Submit a Testimonial' modal.
_comments.default: Settings for the initial view of the modal where the user fills out the form.
_comments.submitting: Text displayed while the testimonial is being submitted.
_comments.success: Content shown after a testimonial is successfully submitted.
_comments.error: Content shown when an unexpected error occurs.
_comments.alreadySubmitted: Content shown if the user's email has already been used for a testimonial.

default.title: Leave a Testimonial
default.description: We'd love to hear about your experience with us. Your feedback is greatly appreciated!

success.title: Thank You!
success.message: Your testimonial has been received. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.

alreadySubmitted.title: Already Submitted
alreadySubmitted.message: It looks like you have already submitted a testimonial with this email address. Thank you for your feedback!
